stadium.name: The Aegis Field
stadium.description: A pristine field within the main temple compound, used as the central training ground for the Shield. The pitch is bordered by the library and monastery, and is said to be protected by the twin lights, Dawn's Hope and Silver Twilight.

stats.pregame_ritual: Tying their bootlaces together and hopping to the starting line.
Re-taping their shield's handle with fresh leather.
Whispering a secret fear to the Trollball before the game.
Drinking a full waterskin of lukewarm water.
Drawing a detailed, anatomically incorrect diagram of a troll's head.
Passing a 'team luckstone' from player to player without speaking.
Chewing a specific, bitter root said to improve night vision.
Jogging three laps around the perimeter of the field.
Kissing their biceps and whispering words of encouragement to them.
Trying to teach a stray dog a complicated and useless new trick.
Challenging a spectator to a game of tic-tac-toe in the dirt.

stadium.name: The Buccaneer's Bowl
stadium.description: A flashy, pristine stadium built on a private beach exclusively for resort guests. The field is imported turf, and a massive, puppet kraken in the bay entertains the crowd at halftime.

stats.pregame_ritual: Slapping their own helmet until their ears ring.
Sticking leeches to their legs to 'lighten their step'.
Bribing a local oracle with a meat pie for a vague prophecy.
Reviewing hand signals for secret plays.
Reading their own fortune in a scattering of knuckle bones.
Thanking their armor for the protection it's about to offer.
Painting their teeth with a mixture of charcoal and water.
Doing a series of loud, guttural breathing exercises.
Reciting their grocery list backward to clear their mind.
Clapping their hands a prime number of times.
Chugging a raw egg, shell and all.
Sticking leeches to their legs to 'lighten their step'.
Bribing a local oracle with a meat pie for a vague prophecy.

preGame: # TUESDAY NIGHT TROLLBALL: PLAYOFF EDITION! üèÜ Hello there, all you ghouls and gals, it's your favorite demon of the airwaves, Nok the Corrupter, coming to you live from the Aegis Field! We're kicking off the post-season with a real doozy of a matchup! We‚Äôve got those shiny, self-righteous Haven Lights hosting the salty dogs of the Tortell Privateers! It‚Äôs Game 1 of a Best of 3 series, and the stakes are higher than a giant's laundry line! The loser of this series is heading straight for the loser's bracket, and boy, I can smell the desperation from here! üèüÔ∏è We're in the heart of Haven today, folks. Look at this 'Aegis Field'‚Äîso clean it makes my skin crawl! We‚Äôve got 'Hallowed Ground' and 'Twinlight's Glow' supposedly protecting these 'heroes' of the Shield. I‚Äôm hoping the Privateers bring enough grit to stain these pristine floors! Speaking of the Privateers, I saw Lilithe Royce in the dugout earlier sticking leeches to her legs! She says it 'lightens her step,' but I think it just makes her look like a walking snack for a swamp-troll! Meanwhile, Castorina Gies was seen bribing a local oracle with a meat pie. I hope that prophecy included a warning about the blunt end of a Kirkhammer! ‚õ™ On the other side, the Haven Lights are up to their usual holier-than-thou antics. Zwart Bunns was caught whispering a secret fear to the Trollball. I hope that ball tells all his secrets once he's flattened on the turf! These Lights think they're protected by 'Shield's Watch,' but in the playoffs, the only thing watching you is the reaper! It's a sell-out crowd, though I'm surprised any of these stuffy 'heroes' like Sir Tanos or the Moonslayer Artorias could find time to watch a real sport between their busy schedules of being insufferable! Let's get to the action! üçñ
postGame: # A SLAUGHTER AT THE ALTAR! üåä Oh, baby! If you like your Trollball with a side of sacrilege, tonight was your night! The Tortell Privateers just walked into the Aegis Field and treated the Haven Lights like a cheap rug! The final score is a staggering 8 to 2 in favor of the Privateers! Talk about a statement win! The 'Twinlight's Glow' must have been flickering, because the Lights were left in the dark for most of this match! üïØÔ∏è The game started with some real heat! Tybi Reo snagged the ball early, and Marlane Lounge wasted no time sending a message by INJURING Loralee Sunny right out of the gate! I thought we were in for a defensive struggle, but then Coward Tarton missed a shot, and Berkin Waters finally managed to put the Lights on the board with a beautiful shot from Center Field! That was their only high point, folks, and it was all downhill from there! üìâ The Privateers woke up and chose violence! Dib Tufts‚Äîwho I saw chugging a raw egg earlier, shell and all‚Äîlaunched a shot from the Away Field that sailed right through the goal! 2-0! No, wait, that makes it 2-2! And they weren't done! Melisande Eustacia grabbed the ball and fired another one home from Center Field! 4-2! The Privateers were just getting started with the carnage! ü©∏ Let's talk about the hits, because that's why we're here! Goldberg Tova, that beautiful beast, absolutely leveled Zwart Bunns! Then Lilithe Royce‚Äîprobably feeling light as a feather thanks to those leeches‚Äîtackled Farand Keil into the dirt! And the highlight of the first half? Ellan Elburt absolutely demolished Berkin Waters! The healer Riffle Harrington had his hands full trying to patch up those 'heroes' while the Privateers were laughing all the way to halftime! ü©π Halftime didn't help the Lights one bit! As soon as they got back on the field, Goldberg Tova sent Zwart Bunns right back to the infirmary! I haven't seen this much 'holy' blood spilled since the last time Sir Tanos tried to read a book! The Lights tried to mount a comeback with some fancy passing between Dickenson Beker and Zwart Bunns, but Marlane Lounge fumbled the ball like it was a hot coal! ü•• The Privateers capitalized on every mistake! Payson Jan, after clapping his hands exactly thirteen times, took a shot from Center Field and NAILED it! 6-2! The crowd was silent, except for the few Privateer fans who probably snuck in some of Elspeth Ortell's ritual sangria! The resort-goers are definitely going to be celebrating tonight! üç∑ To put the nail in the coffin, Lilithe Royce snagged the ball and fired one last shot from Center Field! 8-2! The Haven Lights looked like they were stuck in mud while the Privateers were dancing on their 'Hallowed Ground'! It was a total breakdown of the Shield's defense! üõ°Ô∏è The stadium's 'Shield's Watch' didn't do a lick of good! Maybe if they spent less time praying and more time practicing their blocks, they wouldn't have been outclassed by a bunch of resort-dwellers! The Privateers now lead the series 1-0! If the Lights don't find some spine in Game 2, they'll be packing their bags for the loser's bracket faster than you can say 'blasphemy'! üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏è What a night! The Privateers showed that even in the playoffs, a little bit of grit and a lot of leeches can overcome any amount of 'divine' favor! I'm Nok the Corrupter, and I'm going to go find where they're keeping that leftover meat pie! See you for Game 2, and remember: if you aren't bleeding, you aren't playing! üíÄ
